item.title: Yum tips
item.description: Yum install specific version yum list docker-ce.x86_64 --showduplicates yum list docker-ce.x86_64 --showduplicates | sort -r yum list docker-ce.x86_64 --showduplicates | sort -r | grep 18.09 https://stackoverflow.com/questions/36545206/how-to-install-specific-version-of-docker-on-centos
